content: this legal text explains the progress of a divorce case between mr c and mrs e they have agreed on the distribution of their assets including property financial accounts and insurance policies they have also agreed on the custody and parental authority of their children with the children living with the mother and both parents making decisions regarding their upbringing the text outlines the arrangements for the childrens accommodation and the division of costs related to their upbringing the parties have also made arrangements for child benefits and tax benefits the text mentions the possibility of authorizing the maintenance claims service to receive payments on behalf of the children in case of nonpayment it also explains the process for recovering child maintenance arrears through the federal public service finance the parties declare their incomes and housing costs the text discusses the adjustment and indexing of maintenance fees based on the consumer price index it mentions the various procedures available to resolve disputes during the divorce process including outofcourt mediation and family court the text concludes by stating that inheritances gifts and legacies received by one spouse will remain their own and any future assets debts or income will be acquired individually the notary confirms the identity of the parties and their compliance with obligations the parties agree that the divorce will have retroactive effect and acknowledge the receipt of payment for the document
